p: Presently, Mimusops zeyheri has several uses in folk medicine [ 25, 28, 30], but the majority of these lack scientific evidence based on responses in biological systems. The inadequate evidence-based data to support the biological potential is a major challenge that hinders the commercialization of the plant. The global spread of various diseases such as cardiovascular disease, cancer, and diabetes calls for the exploration of more natural resources including plant-based therapeutic agent(s). However, studies on the biological efficacy of Mimusops zeyheri including the ideal preparation and processing methods are currently inadequate.
